response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would equally enrich your collection or business. We are offering this masterpiece to you at a special price of $900,000, which represents a significant discount compared to its original valuation of $1,200,000. This is your chance to secure a piece that is not only valuable but also carries a unique story and craftsmanship. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this exclusive offer.", "product_price": 900000}
